hooks.prompt: Before executing any git push command, you MUST first run the /ci-checks slash command to verify all CI checks pass. If any checks fail, do NOT proceed with the push and instead report the failures to the user.

Before executing any git commit command, you MUST ensure the command includes the -s or --signoff flag for DCO (Developer Certificate of Origin) sign-off. If the commit command does not include -s or --signoff, you must add it. This is a project requirement per CLAUDE.md.
